        public void notifyAccepted​(boolean accepted)
        Description copied from class: Login
        This method is called in case the user's username has already been taken by someone else. It calls the askName method one more time if the accepted parameter is false.
        Specified by:
        notifyAccepted in class Login
        Parameters:
        accepted - Indicates whether the user's name of choice has been taken or not

      • notifyHost

        public void notifyHost​(boolean isHost)
        Description copied from class: Login
        If the user is the host, then two questions are asked about how they want to set up the game. Then the server is notified of the user's answer via invoking gameLengthEvent and gameMapEvent
        Specified by:
        notifyHost in class Login
        Parameters:
        isHost - Indicates whether the user is the host (first one to enter the room) or not
